introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to NomadLux. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully.

items.platform: "Platform" refers to the NomadLux website and services
items.user: "User" refers to any person who accesses or uses the Platform
items.host: "Host" refers to users who list properties on the Platform
items.guest: "Guest" refers to users who book properties through the Platform

responsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information and for all activities under their account.

booking.title: 4. Booking and Payments
booking.content: All bookings and payments are processed through our secure platform. Users agree to pay all fees and applicable taxes.

cancellation.title: 5. Cancellation Policy
cancellation.content: Cancellation policies vary by property. Users should review the specific cancellation policy before making a booking.

privacy.title: 6. Privacy
privacy.content: Our privacy practices are governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms and Conditions.
